general_insights: Providing detailed and relevant information about specific user queries can significantly enhance user satisfaction.
Consistency in follow-up and ensuring user queries are fully addressed can lead to sustained high satisfaction levels.
Acknowledging user needs and providing tailored responses can help in maintaining a positive interaction experience.
